code: @Test public void testPing() throws Exception {     boolean pingResult = template.requestBody("direct:ping", "test", Boolean.class).     assertTrue("indexId should be set", pingResult). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() {             from("direct:ping").to("elasticsearch-rest://elasticsearch?operation=Ping&hostAddresses=localhost:" + ES_BASE_HTTP_PORT).         }     }. }
